p: In regard to the toxicological parameters investigated, no significant changes on body and organs (liver, kidney, lung, and heart) weight were seen on the EO-treated groups ( P > 0.05), as shown in Table 3. Hematological parameters of the peripheral blood drawn from C.B-17 SCID mice with HepG2 cell xenografts were also analyzed, as shown in Table 4. Although some variations have been observed, no statistically significant alteration was found in the hematological parameters in the animals treated with the EO ( P > 0.05).
